message: Hello, its my first post here :) I need to download a bunch of small images (Facebook profile thumbs)... What do you suggest? I think downloading it in the same request would be slow, but I don't know which way should I take
@rpedigoni Premature optimization? Want to go with a simple solution initially and move to a task queue if required later on?
Celery would be an option for this kind of task?
If it's regular, hotlink or maybe try celery if it's longer than 5 seconds or so
If it's not part of their API, you're probably breaking their terms of service. If this is a one off thing just put a sleep timer on it between requests if you are hitting some sort of limit.
@issackelly thank you! ill check the terms, but i don't think i'm breaking rules
@micrypt I don't think its premature, its taking almost 1min to download 150 thumbs (using local dev server) but i'll try on the production server
